nodes.bodyText: Same comment as in mulesoft/mule-integration-tests#1007 regarding the way the property is set.
Avoid code duplication with parent class.
The property needs to also be present for the deserialization test.
Ignore this comment. I was wrong, I meant the load test, but it is not necessary.
If you need a Callable, rename variable and rename the method.
I would call the after method in a finally block, and throw and exception if one arises.
